title: mpeg2video Error during analysis
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

Software: Ubuntu 16.10 Cosmic, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut2.0
Hardware: Intel i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz, 15 GB RAM, NVIDIA Quadro P1000 

**Describe the problem**

When analyzing videos, after completion of the progress bar that follows the output "Starting to extract postures"  the following error appears and 2/3 times no analysis files are saved when it occurs.

```
overread 9
[mpeg2video @ 0x55f82f0daf80] Warning MVs not available
```

This error appeared for the first time after successfully analyzing 8 videos with a fully trained (7 iterations) network, and has been occurring every attempted analysis since.

**How to Reproduce the problem**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
In ipython:
```
1. import deeplabcut as dlc
2. config_path = ...
3. video_path = ...
4. dlc.analyze_videos(config_path,[video_path],save_as_csv=True)
```

**Screenshots**

![Screenshot from 2019-06-05 06-22-29](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49351251/58997528-6e4e8680-87d3-11e9-99fc-2376fbcc0417.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-06-05 06-22-38](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49351251/58997529-6e4e8680-87d3-11e9-9b56-db2852190f28.png)
![Screenshot from 2019-06-05 06-22-55](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49351251/58997530-6ee71d00-87d3-11e9-968f-926b05c3e231.png)


**Additional context**
Thank you for making this software, it is awesome!
